attributes.action: Make the MP salary the average salary of all teachers, nurses and care workers
attributes.additional_details:
Average teacher salary: £30,212
https://www.reed.co.uk/average-salary/average-teacher-salary

Average nurse salary: £33,384
https://www.nurses.co.uk/careers-hub/nursing-pay-guide/#average-wage-for-a-UK-Nurse-in-2022

Average care worker salary: £23,550
https://uk.talent.com/salary?job=care+worker

MP salary: £84,144
https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/members/pay-mps/
attributes.background:
Work out the median average annual full-time salary of all state-employed teachers, nurses and care workers in England.

Make a law that MP wages have to be equal to the resulting figure.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
